backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the backend canister with types for subjects, questions, papers, and variants; provides functions to add subjects/questions (single and bulk), query questions by subject/category, and retrieve all questions and variants.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence features related to debugging and fixing file upload in AddQuestion.tsx, including error handling, file input verification, and loading indicators.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, and hooks with detailed descriptions of their functionality, logging, error handling, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, destructive, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, page title "Automatic Question Paper Generation System", and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component using TanStack Router with authentication-based routing via RootComponent; defines all routes (login, dashboard, add-question, question-bank, generate-paper, paper-preview, generated-papers) and displays loading spinner during initialization.
frontend/src/components/EditQuestionModa: Dialog modal component for editing questions that currently displays a placeholder message indicating the feature will be available in a future update.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout with fixed navy sidebar containing navigation menu items with icons, active state highlighting, logout button, and main content area with Outlet for nested routes.
frontend/src/components/PaperCard.tsx: Card component displaying paper summary with subject name, creation date, exam duration, total marks, and a "View Paper" button that navigates to the paper preview page.
frontend/src/components/PaperSection.tsx: Reusable component for rendering a section of questions in a paper with title, sequential numbering starting from startNumber prop, and formatted display of MCQ options.
frontend/src/components/QuestionCard.tsx: Displays a question card with category badges, difficulty level, question text, and MCQ options if applicable. Includes edit and delete buttons, and opens an EditQuestionModal when the edit button is clicked.
frontend/src/components/StatsCard.tsx: A simple card component that displays a statistic with a title, count number, and icon. Used for dashboard statistics display.
frontend/src/components/SubjectManager.t: Manages subjects with a form to add new subjects (ID, name, code) and displays a list of existing subjects with edit/delete actions. Uses localStorage for persistence and backend mutations for adding subjects.
Displays a visual workflow diagram showing the system stages from Subjects through Question Categories, Stored Questions, Paper Generation Engine, to PDF Output with arrow connectors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login, logout, and identity management using DFINITY's AuthClient. Manages authentication state and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including subjects (localStorage-backed) and questions (backend-backed). Provides queries for fetching data and mutations for adding/updating subjects and questions.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration, custom color scheme using oklch color space for navy blue and light blue theme, and dark mode support. Includes custom utility classes for navy and light-blue colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/AddQuestion.tsx: Page for adding individual questions or bulk uploading via CSV/JSON files, with form validation, file parsing, and template download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard displaying stats cards for subjects, questions, and generated papers count, plus a workflow diagram and user principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratedPapers.tsx: Displays a grid of previously generated papers retrieved from localStorage, sorted by creation date.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePaper.tsx: Form page for generating question papers by selecting subject, exam duration, total marks, and question counts per category, with validation and backend actor integration.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page with Internet Identity authentication, redirecting to dashboard on successful login.
frontend/src/pages/PaperPreview.tsx: Displays a preview of a generated paper with variant tabs (A-E), validates paper structure from localStorage, and provides PDF download functionality.
frontend/src/pages/QuestionBank.tsx: Manages subjects and questions with tabs, displays questions filtered by subject and grouped by category, includes error handling and manual refetch.
frontend/src/utils/csvParser.ts: Parses CSV files containing question data, validates headers and required fields (subject, category, questionText, options, correctAnswer, difficultyLevel), converts string values to appropriate enums (QuestionCategory, DifficultyLevel), and returns validated questions with any parsing errors.
frontend/src/utils/csvTemplate.ts: Provides a function to download a CSV template file with sample question data including headers and example rows for MCQ and descriptive questions across different subjects and difficulty levels.
frontend/src/utils/docxParser.ts: Empty file placeholder for Word document parsing functionality.
frontend/src/utils/docxTemplate.ts: Empty file placeholder for Word document template generation functionality.
frontend/src/utils/jsonParser.ts: Parses JSON arrays of question objects, validates required fields and enum values (category, difficultyLevel), ensures MCQ questions have options and correctAnswer fields, and returns validated questions with any parsing errors.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates printable PDF question papers by opening a new window with formatted HTML content including header, paper info, and three sections (A, B, C) with questions, MCQ options, and proper styling for A4 printing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme with Poppins/Inter fonts, OKLCH color system including navy/light-blue academic colors, sidebar/card/chart color tokens, custom shadows, border radius variables, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking the Automatic Question Paper Generation System at version 21, documenting architectural decisions (navy/light-blue theme, database connectivity, PDF generation), known issues (bulk upload not working, papers not displaying), and 21 implemented features covering authentication, dashboard, question management, and paper generation.
